GisAgfGeometryFactory Class Reference

#include <AgfGeometryFactory.h>

Inherits GisGeometryFactoryAbstract.

Inheritance diagram for GisAgfGeometryFactory:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The GisAgfGeometryFactory class is an AGF-based Geometry factory, a concrete class that implements all the members from GisGeometryFactoryAbstract.

Definition at line 36 of file AgfGeometryFactory.h.
